description.zh-cn: 中国内科学家，曾任上海第二医科大学教授、博士生导师，第五、六届全国政协委员。
description.en: Chinese physician in internal medicine, former professor and doctoral supervisor at Shanghai Second Medical University, and a member of the 5th and 6th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.
